thread.title: As service closes, Viners send off their final farewells
thread.title_full: As service closes, Viners send off their final farewells

author: Marissa Wenzke
title: As service closes, Viners send off their final farewells
text:
The time has come: Tuesday marks the end of Vine as we know it.
As the app transforms into Vine Camera, leaving those punchy 6-second videos behind, many of its biggest stars and fans are sharing one last good-bye. 
SEE ALSO: The 5 most dramatic moments for Team Internet in 2016 
There were heartfelt words, sometimes tears and, as always, a lot of laughs. 
Top Viners like Thomas Sanders and Liza Koshy thanked the app for the ways it's changed their lives.



Meanwhile, some decided to post the Vines they and their followers loved most.

Goodbye, my legendary Vine. Thanks for the 10 million+ loops. https://t.co/ARjlRBNQZn 
— Omni (@InfernoOmni) January 17, 2017 
rip vine rip my history https://t.co/ycmMPhyueC 
— Qrion (@_Qrion_) January 17, 2017 
And others just said their farewells in whatever way they knew best.





Goodbye Vine https://t.co/JZhC4PqusZ 
— Derek Theler (@DerekTheler) January 17, 2017
